ygData.subject: Re: Dual Wield (was: Cazic Thule)
ygData.msgSnippet: A loot bonus for bards?  Heh.. sounds good, I ll take it.  It seems all my friends who have moved into the upper teens level wise are just rollin the the plat.
ygData.messageBody:
A loot bonus for bards? Heh.. sounds good, I'll take it. It seems all my
friends who have moved into the upper teens level wise are just rollin the
the plat. Thats good then I guess.

Gediprime
Xegony


----- Original Message -----
From: John Kim <kim@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, June 21, 1999 11:10 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Dual Wield (was: Cazic Thule)


> From: John Kim <kim@...>
>
> On Mon, 21 Jun 1999, Robert "Nokker" Venters wrote:
> >
> > I stay broke,,, always having to replace my lost banded armor ( I play
on
> > the pvp server )
>
> Ah, that explains it. :-)
>
> > I stay too broke to buy combine weapons ,,, and I just haven't been able
to
> > figure out how to make a bundle of money like the rest of you bards ,,,
of
> > course ,, that's not why I play the game ,, lately ,, if I get something
> > good ,, and a guildmate needs it ,,, it's his ,,
>
> Well, I do that too. I've given away two shiny brass shields,
> screaming mace, combine rapier, combine longsword, two dwarven
> tunics, dwarven axe, bracer of battle, shiny brass halberd,
> lockjaw vest, lots of snakeskin stuff, and countless other
> lesser items and plat, and I'm still rolling in money. I
> would've given away the bloodstained gloves I got last night
> too except we were trying some funky new looting system and
> they were the only things I got for the night. It's getting
> worse too - the people I've given this stuff to are starting
> to give ME stuff. :-)
>
> Maybe it's this hidden luck stat that I keep hearing about.
> Given the nature of the bard, if I were programming the game,
> I would've given bards a bonus to luck. :-)
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
>
